import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router"; import "./singlePost.css"; export default function SinglePost() { const location = useLocation(); const path = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; useEffect(() => { const getPost = async () => { await axios.get("/posts" + path); }; getPost(); }, [path]); return (
